reactor.io.queue

Class InMemoryQueuePersistor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.queue.InMemoryQueuePersistor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>, QueuePersistor<T>

    public class InMemoryQueuePersistor<T>
extends Object
implements QueuePersistor<T>
    A QueuePersistor implementations that stores items in-memory.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini
